Name: Lake
Description: Action: Move a friendly minion from this location to another Lake.

Name: Lake
Description: Action: Move an essence token [1] space from this location

Name: Lake
Description: Shrine [] [] [] essence  Action: When all essence slots are full, tip to gain 3 victory.  Discard and replace with the top land card

Name: Plains
Description: Reaction: Prevent all damage to [1] minion(s) in this location

Name: Plains
Description: Action: Untip 1 minion.  Range [1]

Name: Plains
Description: Shrine [] [] [] essence  Action: When all essence slots are full, tip to gain 3 victory.  Discard and replace with the top land card

Name: Mountains
Description: Reaction:When an essence token is mined within [1] space, mine an essence here

Name: Mountains
Description: Action: Kill a minion Range 1

Name: Mountains
Description: Action: Mine an essence token

Name: Altar
Description: Action: Tip to gain 2 victory points

Name: Research
Description: Draw [2] cards. Keep 1 of those card(s)

Name: Insight
Description: Draw 3 cards. Keep [1] of those cards

Name: Bow of Justice
Description: Target friendly minion at Range [1].  That minion may tip and kill a minion at Range 2

Name: Bow of Vengeance
Description: Target friendly minion at Range 2.  That minion may tip and kill a minion at Range [2]

Name: Nine-Pound Hammer
Description: Target friendly minion at Range 1.  That minion may tip kill up to [2] minions at Range 0

Name: Lightning
Description: Target friendly minion at Range 1.  That minion may tip and kill a chain of [2] minions in adjacent locations

Name: Fireball
Description: Target friendly minion at Range 1.  That minion may tip and kill all other minions at a single location: Range [1]

Name: Landslide
Description: Target friendly minion at Range [3] at a Mountain.  That minion may tip and kill all minions at a single location: Range 1

Name: Flood
Description: Target friendly minion at Range 3 at a Lake.  That minion may tip to move all minions at a single location by 1 space: Range [1]

Name: Drought
Description: Target friendly minion at Range [3] at a Plains.  That minion may tip and kill all minions (including itself) in Range 1

Name: 7-league Slippers
Description: Move this God [1] space(s)

Name: 7-league Boots
Description: Move this God [3] space(s)

Name: Transposition
Description: Target friendly minion at Range [1].  Move that minion Range 1

Name: Paths
Description: Target friendly minion at Range 1.  Move that minion Range [1]

Name: Boats
Description: Target friendly minion at Range [2].  If that minion is in a Lake, move that minion to any other Lake

Name: Puppet
Description: Target any minion at Range [2]. Do an action with that minion as if it were your own

Name: Shield
Description: Reaction: Prevent a friendly minion in a Plains at Range [3] from being killed

Name: Protection
Description: Reaction: Prevent all minions in a Plains at Range [3] from being killed

Name: Meat Shield
Description: Reaction: Tip friendly minion at Range [3] to prevent another minion at Range 2 from being killed

Name: Exhaustion
Description: Target friendly minion at Range [2].  Tip that minion to tip a God at Range 0

Name: Forget
Description: Target friendly minion at Range [2].  Tip that minion to Tip an Action on a God at Range 1

Name: Sacrilege
Description: Target friendly minion at Range [3].  Tip that minion to move a God at Range 1 by 1 space

Name: Tabula Rasa
Description: Target friendly minion at Range 1.  Tip that minion to Tip [1] Ability card(s) on a God at Range 1

Name: Scry
Description: Reaction: When a friendly minion explores a land tile at Range 5, draw [1] extra land card

Name: Pump
Description: Reaction: Tip to Pump any action by +1

Name: Glory
Description: Reaction: When any minions are killed as a result of a single action, score a victory point for each one

Name: Divine Path
Description: Tip a straight line of X friendly minions, starting and ending at a Lake.  Score X victory points.

Name: Meditation
Description: Target friendly minion in a Plains.  Tip all friendly minions on Plains at Range [1].  Score a victory point for each of those minions.
